scripts.docker:sync: echo 'Docker cannnot copy files from a parent directory so we need to put the current dev version of express-markdown-pages in this directory and change package.json'; mkdir -p express-markdown-pages ; rsync --delete --exclude='*.DS_Store' --exclude='example' --exclude='.git' --exclude='node_modules' -aHxv ../ express-markdown-pages/ ; cat package.json | sed -e 's|file:..|file:express-markdown-pages|g' > package.json.docker
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:sync; docker build . -t thejimmyg/express-markdown-pages:0.1.6
scripts.docker:run:local: npm run docker:sync && docker-compose stop && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up --build -d
